ROOT.GetFullList: SELECT B.ID,B.NAME,TOWER_COUNT,AVG_DISTANCE,'' AS REALLOAD,B.CAPACITY AS TOTALCAPACITY,MATAIN_ID,M.NAME AS MNAME,LENGTH,MIN_WIDTH,LINE_WIDTH,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,LOCATION,ID_KEY,STATE, LINE_ID,START_TOWER_ID,START_TOWER_NO,START_TOWER_NAME,END_TOWER_ID,END_TOWER_NO,END_TOWER_NAME,R.CAPACITY,'不用','不用','不用','不用' FROM YS_DB.YSH_CON_MIJITONGDAO_B B JOIN YS_DB.YSH_CON_MIJITONGDAO_R R ON B.ID=R.TD_ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_ORG_MAINTORG_B M ON B.MATAIN_ID=M.ID
